definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: Everywhere they appeared they were ovations.
sentences.chinese: 他們所到之處都有人歡呼。

sentences.english: He went to strike at the hedge, but where his sword met the thorns, great roses bloomed instead.
sentences.chinese: 他開始披荊斬棘，但是他寶劍所到之處都開出了薔薇。

sentences.english: This footprint damages and depletes almost everything in its path.
sentences.chinese: 這些足跡所到之處破壞並耗盡了幾乎一切資源。

sentences.english: Wherever he went, the wound soldier left behind him a trail of blood.
sentences.chinese: 傷員所到之處，都留下道道血跡。

sentences.english: They went to meet prime minister Jospin.
sentences.chinese: 所到之處，以滿足總理若斯潘。

sentences.english: Everywhere are the collapsed buildings, such as death or injury to life, a bleak.
sentences.chinese: 所到之處，都是殘垣斷壁如死傷的生命，一片淒涼。

sentences.english: The hurricane flattered crops, uprooted trees, washed away roads and rippled off roofs.
sentences.chinese: 颶風所到之處，莊稼倒伏，樹根拔起，房頂掀飛。

sentences.english: Everywhere you turn, people are talking about trends. On a CNN news show, a Chyron runs in the corner of the screen pointing out stories that are "trending now."
sentences.chinese: 你所到之處，人們都在談論潮流。

sentences.english: It will give you a whole new perspective on the place you are visiting.
sentences.chinese: 這將給你一個全新的視角來觀察你們所到之處。

sentences.english: Wherever we looked, we saw evidence of destruction.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目光所到之處，都是毀壞的跡象。

sentences.english: The leaves rustled where Tim had disappeared into the underbrush.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆消失在灌木從裏，他所到之處樹葉沙沙作響。

sentences.english: Everywhere he went, audiences reacted with almost delirious delight.
sentences.chinese: 他所到之處，聽衆無不歡欣若狂。

sentences.english: He leads an army so massive it shakes the ground with its march.
sentences.chinese: 他率領的部隊是如此豪壯，所到之處地動山搖。
